ygData.subject: Re: Training - will this work?
ygData.msgSnippet: Ooi, my lvl already so low liao, if I con t like tat, sooner or later I will eat grass leh.  Team with u guys not a prob, prob is the xp lah.  U guys all lvl
ygData.messageBody:
Ooi, my lvl already so low liao, if I con't like tat, sooner or later I
will eat grass leh. Team with u guys not a prob, prob is the xp lah. U
guys all lvl 16-18, me team sure get no xp ;( Frankly speaking, xp is more
impt than loot to me, I better go oasis solo hunt caiman for xp NEXT to the
zone, hehe.

Yeah, bind in Ro to Oasis zone entrance, then hunt whole night for caiman.
Anything wrong just zone. If die, resurrent in Ro, zone and hunt again,
hahahahahahahah! ;-P

On Thursday, June 17, 1999 6:38 PM, Gary Qui Hong Loong
[SMTP:kanglun@...] wrote:
> From: Gary Qui Hong Loong <kanglun@...>
>
> Just let us wrack to get it's attention the u wack lor. I can heal u
what. and
> u can bind too so what's the worri??
>
> LKW wrote:
>
> > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> >
> > Err, can lvl 10-14 survive in Guk? My shock of lighting, thou can
inflict
> > 78 dam per cast, but only can cast 5-6 times only in a row. If
monsters
> > dun die, then I sure die leh.
> >
> > Dun forget once high lvl player hurt 40% dam and tank, ultimately the
low
> > lvl player will hit more than 50%, and it's possible for monsters to
turn
> > their attack toward the low lvl player. My HP only 200, at most 3 hit
from
> > high lvl monster I sure die man! Maybe try oasis 1st lah, hehe.
> >
> > Zil
> >
> > On Thursday, June 17, 1999 5:38 PM, Gary Qui Hong Loong
> > [SMTP:kanglun@...] wrote:
> > > From: Gary Qui Hong Loong <kanglun@...>
> > >
> > > Good 'cos I just spent 120pp to buy bronze armor and own my
friend
> > 85p
> > > heheheh. We can try doing it on this Sat or Sun at Guk
> > >
> > > LKW wrote:
> > >
> > > > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> > > >
> > > > Actually I've think of a way for high lvl players to help the lower
lvl
> > > > players to gain XP, while high lvl play gain stuffs (win-win
situation
> > for
> > > > both):
> > > >
> > > > - high lvl player tank and hit a monster left 60% HP.
> > > > - lower lvl player start to nuke while high lvl player stop
attacking
> > and
> > > > just tank.
> > > > - once monser kena killed, lower lvl player will get all the xp coz
he
> > does
> > > > more dam than the high lvl player (both not in a group)
> > > > - this method is more effective than to team with high lvl player,
> > whack
> > > > together and high lvl player quit from team when monsters abt to
die
> > > > (anyway this method also need the lower lvl member to do more than
50%
> > of
> > > > the dam).
> > > >
> > > > This method is best for helping classes with high nuking ability,
since
> > the
> > > > lower lvl player have to do more than 50% of the dam. H/w, we can
be
> > > > flexible in using this method as the team can be made up of 1 high
lvl
> > > > player to tank and do 40% of the dam, while the remaining r made up
of
> > a
> > > > group of low lvl players (so that after the high lvl player inflict
40%
> > dam
> > > > and the low lvl group finish the monster off with the remaining 60%
> > dam).
> > > > This method required NO group between the high lvl player and the
low
> > lvl
> > > > players.
> > > >
> > > > To be fair, I guess the low lvl players won't mind to let the high
lvl
> > > > player to get all the loot for spending his time tanking and
training
> > them
> > > > ;)
> > > >
> > > > Alternatively, the high lvl player and the low lvl player group can
> > take
> > > > turn to kill/loot, which to me it's fairer for both side.
> > > >
> > > > Oh b4 i forget, guys pls dun buy anymore runed totem staff on my
> > behalf. I
> > > > got it from a dark elf last night after long negotiation to a price
of
> > 20pp
> > > > ;) With that staff, now I can hunt wisp liao.
> > > >
> > > > Ziltus
> > > >
> > > > On Thursday, June 17, 1999 9:52 AM, Alex
[SMTP:leealex@...]
> > > > wrote:
> > > > > From: "Alex" <leealex@...>
> > > > >
> > > > > I have been postponing the trip to Guk for the foloowing selfish
> > reasons
> > > > :P
> > > > >
> > > > > 1) The lower guk has very mean monsters(2oth-30th lvl) that
carries
> > nice
> > > > > stuff: There my shopping list:
> > > > > a)collar of undead protection, 5hp,7 vs disease and poison,
> > > > > b)The Jorneyman boots-slightly slower than SOW, just click on it
and
> > > > > run.-Very nice
> > > > > c) Silverplate plate bracers-+ 7hp (upperguk)
> > > > > d) Azure sleeves +12hp weight only 0.4 (lower guk)
> > > > > e) Kobold boots
> > > > > f) mesh , mesh mesh
> > > > > and the animated Hand that gives out ????
> > > > >
> > > > > 2) My lvl is only 17th , cant hit the lower guk yet. I can hit
the
> > upper
> > > > guk
> > > > > Gaz, taz warriors for the mesh but the next time i go back to
lower
> > guk,
> > > > my
> > > > > factions with them is so bad that any frogglock and Kolbold that
will
> > KOS
> > > > me
> > > > > onsight. I hope to hit 20+ lvl go striagth into lower guk and
storm
> > the
> > > > > buggers.
> > > > >
> > > > > 3) Is so difficult to gather a group at the FIX day and time to
hunt
> > for
> > > > at
> > > > > least 3-4 hrs, camp there and go back in again at a later
> > time-Together
> > > > and
> > > > > so on. It IS very important to be in Group.
> > > > >
> > > > > There my suggested list of personal in the Guk group
> > > > > a) at least 1 monk
> > > > > b) at least 1 Paladin
> > > > > c) 1 Shaman
> > > > > d) 1 Wiz
> > > > > c) 1 rogue
> > > > > d) anyone/any char
> > > > >
> > > > > Monk and paladin to tank, shaman to hit and buff, wiz to ROOT and
hit
> > > > -this
> > > > > 4 char r the mininum for a group. Xp is NOt the purpose. It the
> > Goodies
> > > > we
> > > > > all want. i say if u r below lvl 10th also can come for the
> > adventure,
> > > > thats
> > > > > if u dont mind the xp.
> > > > > Garren is now 18th Pal
> > > > > Leshrec is 17th Wiz, can made 18th by weekend, np
> > > > > Yiyang 17th Monk, may nit make 18th by weekend- got problem :P
> > > > > Trifrost 14th Shaman, can make 15th by weekend, np
> > > > >
> > > > > Some of u are experience in Guk eg, Garren ,Sereph and Leshrec,
etc ,
> > > > your
> > > > > comments pls.
> > > > >
> > > > > Please add and correct on the above. Im open for the Expedition
to
> > Guk.
> > > > > Today is Thursday. Wanna meets on Saturday mornning?? I hve to
log
> > at
> > > > > 1:00pm and be back at 8:pm. suggestion please.
> > > > >
> > > > > Yiyang of Innoruuk
